import Head from 'next/head' import Link from 'next/link' import Router, { useRouter } from 'next/router' import { useEffect } from 'react' Router.events.on('routeChangeStart', url => { if (url === '/list') { location.href = '/nopermission' } }) export default ({ children }) => { const router = useRouter() useEffect(() => { router.prefetch('/nestStyle') }, []) return (
layout head
主页 | 列表页 | 内联样式页
{children}
版权所有
) }
